name: quickhigh.tgz
description: This is a plugin for highlighting quickfix errors.It provides mappings for manualy adding the highlights and commands to automatically add the highlights.It has the ability to work with both the :make and :grep commands.It also has the ability to distinguish between warning and error compiler messages.  Please see the documenation for configuration (help quickhigh.txt after installation).

versions.release_notes: Fixup for when there is col information in the line output.
Modify to work better if ':' is part of a filename.Update to perl embedded file layout suggested by Benoit.
let users define their own signsadded perl code for speedmore error checkingmisc bugs fixed
